With the three colors of buckets below, match action to the correct bucket by clicking the action text then the corresponding bucket.

Add warm water to the bucket.

Step 1: The red rinse bucket

Add soap to the bucket, then fill with warm water

Step 2: The gray wash bucket

a) Fill the bucket with cold water.

b) Add a sufficient amount of bleach to achieve a concentration of 100 parts per million, or 100PPM.

Step 3: The white sanitizer bucket
